data.client_settings: table, Build Number: 14308, Version Hash: c6d6ff0164901ec2bdce707e57891c2a569b146a
data.actual_result: The green circle stays around them while ringing.
data.expected_result: It should remove the green circle as they are NOT currently talking, as they are not connected.
data.short_description: If you call someone while they are talking in a voice-channel, the green 'talking' circle stays around their picture while ringing.
data.steps_to_repro: - Be in a voice channel with someone - Make them nonstop talk - Call them
